abstract: T. Rowe Price has made several recent investments in social media companies, including Facebook and Zynga, according to recent filings. The value of its Facebook investments, made through various funds, totals $190.5 million, according to calculations made by DealBook.

lead_paragraph: T. Rowe Price has made several recent investments in social media companies, including Facebook and Zynga, according to recent filings.

headline.main: T. Rowe Price Discloses $190 Million Stake in Facebook
